Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class SpecialsSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.SpecialsSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneController
public class SpecialsSceneController extends Object implements SceneController
SpecialsSceneController is the controller of the specials scene.

  • Method Details

    • initializedSpecialsScene

      public void initializedSpecialsScene(ArrayList<Integer> specialsList, ArrayList<Integer> cost)
      Initialized scene with specials list and their cost.
      Parameters:
      specialsList - is an ArrayList with the 3 specials extracted.
      cost - is an ArraList with the cost of each special.

    • resetScene

      public void resetScene()
      After the use of some specials who change images they have to be reset with this method.

    • setCoins

      protected void setCoins(int specialIndex, int newValue)
      Set the new cost of a special.
      Parameters:
      specialIndex - is the index of the ArrayList of the special.
      newValue - is the new cost.

    • setStudent

      protected void setStudent(int specialIndex, int color, int value)
      Set the new student of a special.
      Parameters:
      specialIndex - is the index of the ArrayList of the special.
      color - is the color of the new students.
      value - is the new number of students.

    • setNoEntry

      protected void setNoEntry(int special, int value)
      Set the new value of the No Entry tiles.
      Parameters:
      special - is the index of the ArrayList of the special.
      value - is the new number of the No Entry tiles.

    • setSpecialChosen

      public void setSpecialChosen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      After clicking a special this method set the specialChosen variable with his name.
      Parameters:
      event - is the click on a special.

    • setStudentColor

      public void setStudentColor(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      After clicking a student this method set the studentChosen variable with his color.
      Parameters:
      event - is the click on a student.

    • confirmPressed

      public void confirmPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When confirm button is clicked the method call the proxy to check if player can use that special.
      Parameters:
      event - is the click on confirm button.

    • confirmSpecialButtonPressed

      public void confirmSpecialButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When confirm special button is clicked the method call the proxy to check if move is allowed or call a gui method to continue to use the special in other scene.
      Parameters:
      event - is the click on confirm special button.

    • addButtonPressed

      public void addButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When add button is clicked the method add the student chosen to an ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      event - is the click on add button.
